author: Se Young Lee
title: China seeks to contain 'silent carriers' of new coronavirus
description: China took new measures on Wednesday to try to prevent asymptomatic "silent carriers" of the new coronavirus from causing a second wave of infections, as the country reported another modest rise in confirmed cases.
content:
BEIJING/WUHAN, China (Reuters) - China took new measures on Wednesday to try to prevent asymptomatic “silent carriers” of the new coronavirus from causing a second wave of infections, as the country reported another modest rise in confirmed cases.
